add-a-song: Ongeza wimbo kutoka kitabu cha wimbo kwenye orodha.
add-a-video-explain: Ongeza video kutoka kwa tovuti la jw.org kwenye orodha ya media. Video za hivi karibuni zinaonyeshwa hapa, lakini unaweza pia kutafuta video zote ikiwa inahitajika.
advancedDescription: Wengine wanaweza kupendelea kubadilisha mipangilio hii, lakini kwa hali za kawaida mipangilio iko sawa.
also-look-for-this-button-in-m-s-footer: Pia, tafuta kitufe hiki kwenye maelezo ya chini ya M³:
app-description: Meeting Media Manager ni programu ya kuonyesha media kwenye mikutano ya kutaniko ya Mashahidi wa Yehova. Inaunganishwa na Studio ya OBS kwa onyesho la media kwa mbofyo mmoja katika Jumba la Ufalme na kwenye Zoom. Kwa utendakazi wake na mwonekano mzuri, M³ hupunguza mzigo kwa watumishi wa sauti/video. Inaunga fomati zote za faili za kitheokrasi, pamoja na faili za PDF na faili za kawaida za media. Inaweza kukamilisha au hata kuchukua nafasi ya JW Library, kulingana na mahitaji ya kutaniko lenu.
app-issues: Ikiwa unakabiliana na changamoto zozote au umepata kosa, tafadhali tengeneza 'Tatizo" kwenye mfumo wa GitHub au kupitia "GitHub Discussions", ukieleza tatizo kwa undani zaidi. Tutahakikisha tumewasiliana nawe na kukusaidia ipasavyo.
applicationConfigurationDescription: Badili hali na mwonekano wa mfumo ili ukufae
are-you-sure-delete: Je, uko hakika unataka kufuta faili hii "{mediaToDelete}"?
are-you-sure-delete-all: Are you sure you want to delete all extra media files for the selected day?
are-you-sure-delete-cache: Je, uko hakika unataka kufuta faili zote zilizohifadhiwa?
are-you-sure-delete-unused-cache: Je, uko hakika unataka kufuta faili zisizotumika kutoka kwa hifadhi ya faili?
are-you-sure-you-want-to-delete-this-pro: Je, uko hakika unataka kufuta wasifu wa {profileName}?
autoStartAtLogin: Washa programu ya M³ moja kwa moja
autoStartAtLogin-explain: M³ inaweza kuwaka moja kwa moja kompyuta inapowashwa.
autoStartMusic: Anzisha muziki wa chinichini moja kwa moja kabla ya mikutano
autoStartMusic-explain: Muziki wa chinichini utaanza kucheza kiotomatiki ikiwa mkutano umeratibiwa kuanza ndani ya dakika au saa baada ya M³ kuwashwa.
clicking-it-will-allow-you-to-start-and-: Kuibofya kutakuruhusu kuanza na kusimamisha uchezaji wa muziki wa usuli. Muziki utaanza kucheza kiotomatiki kabla ya mkutano kuratibiwa kuanza M³ itakapofunguliwa, na pia itaacha kiotomatiki kabla ya mkutano kuanza. Hata hivyo, uchezaji wa muziki wa chinichini utahitaji kuanzishwa na wewe mwenyewe baada ya sala ya kumalizia, kwa kutumia kitufe hiki.
clicking-it-will-allow-you-to-temporaril: Kuibofya kutakuruhusu kuficha media na maandishi ya mwaka kwa muda, na kuwafichua washiriki wa Zoom walio chini yao. Mara tu sehemu ya Zoom inapoisha, unaweza kuonyesha maandishi ya mwaka tena kwa kutumia kitufe kile kile.
coWeek: Tarehe iliyopangiwa ya ziara ya Mwangalizi
coWeek-explain: Ikiwekwa, M³ itahamisha kiotomatiki mkutano wa katikati ya wiki hadi Jumanne ya wiki hiyo. Pia itaruka midia ya Funzo la Biblia la Kutaniko, na kuruka nyimbo za kumalizia za mikutano ya katikati ya juma na ya mwisho-juma.
configure-a-scene-in-obs-studio-to-captu: Sanidi scene katika Studio ya OBS ili kunasa midia.
configure-a-scene-in-obs-studio-to-show-: Sanidi scene ya OBS Studio ili kuonyesha video ya jukwaa.
configure-the-websocket-plugin-in-obs-st: Utahitaji kusanidi kiunganishi cha Websocket kwenye OBS Studio. Kiunganishi cha Virtual Camera kitahitajika pia, hivyo hakikisha umeisakinisha na kuisanidi.
congregation-lookup-explain: Ingiza jina la Kutaniko na mji au eneo unaopatikana. Habari hizi zitatumika kujaribu kupakua moja kwa moja ratiba na lugha ya kutaniko.
congregationMeetingsDescription: Mipangilio inayohusiana na kutaniko lako na ratiba ya mkutano
congregationName-explain: Jina hili litaonyeshwa kwenye menu ya profile.
currently-loading: Media ya tarehe hii inapakia kwa sasa.
custom-background-removed: The custom background has now been removed.
custom-background-set: The chosen image is now displayed instead of the yeartext.
custom-background-will-not-persist: Please note that the custom background will not be saved if you quit the app.
darkMode-explain: Lazimisha mfumo utumie hali ya mwangaza au giza, au tumia mipangilio ya kompyuta yako
disableMediaFetching: Tumia M³ pamoja na JW Library
disableMediaFetching-explain: Kuiwasha kutazima kupakua midia kiotomatiki katika M³. Katika hali hiyo, JW Library inaweza kutumika kuonyesha midia ya kawaida ya mikutano, na M³ inaweza kutumika kuonyesha midia zingine. M³ ina vipengele vingi vya vitendo kama vile kuleta hati za PDF na kukuza na kupanua picha. Tafadhali kumbuka kuwa kigeuzi hiki kinapaswa kuzimwa katika takriban visa vyote.
does-your-kingdom-hall-use-a-program-cal: Je, Jumba lako la Ufalme hutumia mfumo wa OBS Studio?
doing-so-will-greatly-simplify-and-facil: Kufanya hivyo kutafanya uonyeshaji wa media katika mikutano inayotumia mifumo kama zoom iwe rahisi sana.
dont-forget-add-circuit-overseer-media: Usisahau kuongeza wimbo wa Mwangalizi wa mzunguko wa kumalizia.
dont-forget-to-add-circuit-overseer-date: Kwa ajili ya matokeo mazuri, ongeza tarehe ya ziara ya mwangalizi wa mzunguko kwenye sehemu ya "{ congregationMeetings }" kwa { settings }.
enableExtraCache: Hifadhi faili za video za muziki
enableExtraCache-explain: Hifadhi video zote za kitabu cha nyimbo ili kuboresha utendaji. Kumbuka kwamba kutaongeza ukubwa wa hifadhi ya media.
enableKeyboardShortcuts-explain: Tumia mikato ya kibodi kurahisisha uwasilishaji wa media.
enableMediaDisplayButton-explain: Onyesha picha na video kwa kisehemu au kwenye televisheni. Ikiwa unaitumia kwenye Jumba La Ufalme, inafaa kuwashwa kwa visa vyote.
enableMusicButton: Washa uchezaji wa muziki wa usuli
enableMusicButton-explain: Cheza muziki kabla na baada ya mikutano kwa kubofya kitufe tu.
enter-a-key-combination-now-using-your-k: Ingiza mikato sasa kupitia kibodi yako.
enter-the-port-and-password-configured-i: Ingiza port na jina siri la usanidi wa OBS Studio's Websocket plugin.
errorDownloadingMeetingMedia: Tatizo kutokana na upakuaji wa media
excludeFootnotes: Toa media za maelezo ya chini ya Mnara wa Mlinzi
excludeFootnotes-explain: Usipakue media za maelezo ya chini ya makala ya Mnara wa Mlinzi.
excludeTh: Usipakue media zozote za Broshua ya kufundisha
excludeTh-explain: Usipakue media zozote za Broshua ya kufundisha.
feel-free-to-browse-around-the-other-ava: Hisi huru kutafuta chaguo zingine zinazopatikana, au ukipenda unaweza kuelekea kwenye skrini ya kucheza media na kuanza kuitumia kuonyesha media.
file-not-available: Faili unayotaka haipo kwa sasa. Tafadhali jaribu tena, au pakua kutoka kwa kompyuta yako.
fileProcessError: Kumekuwa na tatizo kuhusiana na faili hii
filetypeNotSupported: Faili ya aina hii haiezi pakuliwa kwa sasa
hideMediaLogo: Ficha nembo ya JW kutoka kwa kisehemu cha media
hideMediaLogo-explain: Hii itaondoa nembo ya JW kutoka kwa kisehemu cha kulia chini. Ikiwa unaitumia kwenye Jumba La Ufalme, kwa hali nyingi inafaa kuzimwa.
images-videos-explain: Picha, video, faili za sauti, hati za PDF, na midia zingine mbalimbali
in-what-language-should-media-be-downloa: Ungependa kupakua midia katika lugha ipi?
include-audio-description: Pakua video zilizo na maelezo ya sauti
includePrinted: Pakua midia kutoka kwa machapisho mengine
includePrinted-explain: Onyesha picha za ziada kutoka kwa machapisho ya matoleo yaliyochapishwa ambayo huenda yasiwe katika matoleo ya dijitali.
integrationsDescription: Panga utumiaji wa programu na huduma zingine
is-obs-studio-configured-correctly: Je, mipangilio ya OBS Studio iko sahihi?
jw-playlist: Orodha ya Media ya JW Library
jw-playlist-explain: Faili ya orodha ya midia za JW Library
jwpubNoMultimedia: Faili ya JWPUB haina midia yoyote
lang-explain: Chagua lugha ambayo mikutano huendeshwa. Lugha hii itatumiwa kupakua na kucheza midia.
langFallback-explain: Unaweza kuchagua lugha ya pili hapa ikiwa midia haipatikani kwenye lugha ya kutaniko kwa ukawaida.
langSubtitles-explain: Lugha hii ni ya vinukuu zitakazo pakuliwa na kuchezwa.
local-media-explain-1: Pakua picha, video, faili za sauti, orodha ya midia ya JW Library, faili za JWPUB, au faili za PDF kutoka kwa kompyuta yako na zitatokea kwenye orodha.
local-media-explain-2: Bonyeza hapa kuona orodha nzima ya faili zinazoweza kupakuliwa.
localAppLang-explain: Hii ndiyo lugha M³ itaonyeshwa. Haita dhuru lugha ya kupakua midia.
look-for-this-button-in-m-s-footer: Pia, tafuta kitufe hiki kwenye maelezo ya chini ya M³:
maxRes: Ubora wa juu zaidi wa video
maxRes-explain: Chagua kiwango cha juu cha ubora wa video. Video zenye kiwango cha juu zaidi hazitapakuliwa.
mediaRetrievalAndPlaybackDescription: Panga mipangilio ya kupakua na kucheza midia.
musicVolume-explain: Chagua kiwango cha sauti ya nyimbo za usuli. Hii itasaidia kuweka kiwango cha nyimbo hizi chini bila kuathiri sauti ya midia ya kawaida.
mwDay: Siku ya mkutano wa kati ya juma
mwDay-explain: Chagua siku ambayo mikutano ya katikati ya juma hufanywa.
mwStartTime: Wakati wa mikutano ya kati juma
mwStartTime-explain: Chagua wakati ambapo mikutano ya kati ya juma huanza.
next-day-with-media: Nenda kwenye siku ya kwanza yenye midia
no-circuit-overseer-date-set: Bado haujaweka tarehe ya ziara ya Mwangalizi wa Mzunguko
no-media-files-for-section: Hakuna midia kwa sehemu hii ya mkutano.
no-results-explain: Utahitaji kuweka maelezo ya kutaniko lako wewe mwenyewe ikiwa utafutaji haujafaulu.
no-results-short-explain: Utahitaji kuweka zaidi ya herufi mbili ili kuanza kutafuta.
noDateSelected: Bado hakuna tarehe bado haija wekwa.
notice-the-yeartext-is-now-being-display: Utagundua andiko la mwaka sasa linaonyeshwa kwenye scrini ya nje! Lakini tuendelee.
obs-studio-is-a-free-app-used-to-manage-: OBS Studio ni programu isiyolipisha inayotumiwa kudhibiti kamera na video katika Majumba mengi ya Ufalme.
obs-studio-media-scene: Eneo ya midia ya OBS Studio
obs-studio-port-and-password: Port na neno siri ya OBS Studio
obsCameraScene: Default stage view scene in OBS Studio
obsCameraScene-explain: The scene in OBS Studio that will be used as the default stage view. As per latest direction, this should be a wide shot.
obsEnable-explain: Connect M³ to OBS Studio to enable automated switching between media and camera scenes.
obsImageScene: Scene to display images in OBS Studio [optional]
obsImageScene-explain: A scene can be configured in OBS Studio specifically to display images, for example in a picture-in-picture style. If this is left blank, the default media scene will be used instead.
obsMediaScene: Media window scene in OBS Studio
obsMediaScene-explain: The scene in OBS Studio that will be used to broadcast media to Zoom participants.
obsPassword-explain: Find the configured password under Tools > WebSocket Server Settings in OBS Studio.
obsPort-explain: Find the configured port under Tools > WebSocket Server Settings in OBS Studio.
once-the-scene-has-been-created-select-i: Once the scene has been created, select it here.
only-show-settings-that-are-not-valid: Only show settings that are not valid
pdfFilesNotSupported: PDF files are not supported yet
please-use-image-or-jwpub: Please select an image file or a JWPUB file that contains an image
please-wait-downloading-media-for-this-d: Please wait, downloading media for this day...
profile-type-regular: In most cases, choosing "Regular" is the best option. This will create a profile that downloads media for all meetings automatically and also enables media presentation features that are most often used during congregation meetings.
profile-type-special: Choose "Other" if you are creating a profile for which no media should be automatically downloaded. Media will have to be manually imported for use in this profile. This type of profile is used mostly for theocratic schools, assemblies, and other special cases.
scene-not-found: A problem occurred while activating a scene in OBS Studio.
scene-not-found-explain: Please validate the configured scenes in the settings.
select-a-custom-background: Choose an image that will be displayed as the background image instead of the yeartext. This would normally be used only on special occasions, such as the Memorial.
select-a-date-to-begin: Please select a date to begin.
select-s34mp-to-add-public-talk-media: Select an S-34mp JWPUB file downloaded from jw.org to quickly access the Public Talk Media Playlist. The file will be cached and can be updated by browsing to an updated version at any time.
selected-jwpub-no-media: The selected JWPUB file does not contain any media.
setupWizard.intro: M³ is an app designed to make your playing media at congregation meetings easy and stress-free. Let's configure a few things, and then we'll get on our way.
shortcutMediaWindow-explain: Shortcut to quickly hide or show the media window.
shortcutMusic-explain: Shortcut to start or stop the background music.
speaker: Speaker
successfully-migrated-from-the-previous-: Successfully migrated from the previous version
sureStopVideo: Are you sure you want to stop the video?
the-name-of-your-congregation-or-group-w: The profile name will help you to quickly switch between profiles, if you ever decide to create more than one in the future.
there-are-no-media-items-for-the-selecte: There are no media items for the selected date.
this-will-only-delete-media-for-this-day: This action will only remove extra media for the selected day
this-will-speed-up-media-retrieval-for-m: This will speed up media retrieval for meeting media, but is not mandatory.
to-add-files-from-your-computer-drag-and: To add files from your computer, drag-and-drop them directly into this window.
to-quickly-show-and-hide-zoom-participan: Tip: To ensure you're able to quickly show and hide Zoom participants on the TV screens when needed, make sure that the setting to "use dual monitors" in Zoom is enabled.
tryConfiguringFallbackLanguage: Try configuring a fallback language in the settings
use-the-import-button-to-add-media-for-t: Use the Import button to add media for this date or select another date to view the corresponding meeting media.
use-the-slider-below-to-adjust-the-start: Use the slider below to adjust the start and end time of this media item. This is useful for playing only certain parts of a video.
weDay-explain: Choose the day on which the weekend meeting takes place.
weStartTime-explain: Choose the time at which the weekend meeting starts.
well-start-fetching-media-while-we-wrap-: We'll start fetching media while we wrap up with our initial setup.
what-are-your-meeting-days-and-times-wel: What are your meeting days and times? We'll use this information to display the media calendar.
what-kind-of-profile-is-this: Choose the type of profile you would like to create.
what-language-would-you-like-m-to-be-dis: What language would you like M³ to be displayed in?
when-you-are-done-presenting-the-website: When you are done presenting the website, you can either close the website window, or click again on the button in the top right corner of this window.
when-you-click-the-button-on-the-top-rig: When you click the button on the top right corner of this window, a new window will open where the website will be presented. What you see in this window will be mirrored into the media window.
would-you-like-to-enable-songbook-video-: Would you like to cache all songbook videos?
would-you-like-to-integrate-m-with-obs-s: Would you like to integrate M³ with OBS Studio?
you-can-also-use-the-button-below-to-bro: You can also browse for files manually if you prefer.
